Tech to Empower

Technology Creates Opportunity

Donate Today

Our Philosophy

At Tech to Empower, we believe reliable access to technology is a basic right. Our work focuses on bridging the digital divide and empowering underprivileged students. Many social issues plaguing our rapidly changing world can be attributed to unequal access to technology. Addressing this disparity is critical to fulfilling our mission.

Mission Statement: Tech to Empower combats inequalities in technology access by refurbishing and upgrading donated technology and distributing it to those in need.

Previous Next

The Digital Divide

The “digital divide” refers to the growing gap between the underprivileged members of society who don’t have reliable access to technology or the Internet; and the wealthier members of society who have access.

How We Use Donations

After we receive tech donations, we wipe the device data in order to safeguard the private information of our generous donors. We then run a series of tests to gauge the usability of the computer and decide what upgrades can and should be made. Then, we use monetary donations to purchase parts in bulk and refurbish the devices. If a donation we receive is not salvageable, we properly recycle the device through one of our e-waste partners.

At Tech to Empower, we believe in the quality of our services and ensure each device we give to those in need meets a certain standard. Though the devices we receive are often outdated, we have the means to thoroughly clean and future proof the devices we donate to those who need them. Additionally, we take the liberty of installing helpful tools and guiding those who receive our laptops in the hopes that our donation recipients can create more opportunities for themselves.

Monetary Donation

Paypal, Debit, Credit, Cash, and Check

We accept monetary donations through PayPal, debit card, or credit card. If you would like to donate through cash or check, contact us.

Technology Donations

Laptops, Tablets, Phones, and prepaid internet devices

If you have an old laptop, tablet, or phone in usable condition and are not sure what to do with it, consider donating it to Tech to Empower. For technology donations, we can either come to you to collect your donation or meet halfway, depending on your location.
